1113111.title: Raikou

11131112.content:
Thirteen years have past since the day Raikou was born. He grew up to nearly 6' 4" through those years. His appearance has not changed much, but he has started to gain some muscle over the years. Raikou became a nice, kind, good-hearted boy. He has also became an excellent fisherman, like his father.

---

I was out in the water on a boat with my father. The sun was shining bright and the water was calm. My father was a good fisherman, but I became better. Still, my father usually brought the load in and received most of the credit, it felt good to help him out. Most of the villagers did not like me to be in there, some of them were very nice. The rope tugged, and we grabbed the line.

"Ready son?" asked my father.

"Ready!" I replied.

At once, we grabbed the rope and pulled it on. The net was slowly getting pulled up. Eventually, we got the entire load onto the boat. This was probably the biggest load we have ever brought in, and my father agreed. We rowed back into shore, and I started to place some of the fish in the bucket. My father walked up to me and placed his hand on my shoulders.

"Son" he said, "Today, you should come into town with me."

"Are you sure?" I asked. "What will everyone do?"

"I do not know son, but you know I cannot bring this load in alone. Besides, I heard that there is a certain someone that likes you..."

I nearly blushed after that. There was a girl in the village that was always nice to me, but I wasn't even sure if she was there.
11131112.title: Villages best fisherman

111311121.content:
Should I go? I would like to see her again. I never really even asked for her name! Alright, it's official.

"I'll come with you dad" I said.

"Thank you son" he replied. "Just load up the cart and we'll be off."

I loaded all of the barrels full of fish onto the cart. I climbed in the back to avoid being noticed right away. My father laughed and went into the village. The seaside village of Tzar was probably the most visited village around this region. Many different people visited. Tzar is even the village where the king gets his goods! Today, the kings knights were in town loading up on supplies. My dad stopped the cart in front if Merchant Bach's stand. Merchant Bach was a very hefty man, with mire fat than muscle. He was bald, always wore the sane outfit, and had brown eyes. He was talking to a knight in silverish armor.

"Well well" he said. "We were just speaking of you."

"Were you now?" asked my father.

"This knight here was asking when the next load was coming in. And I was telling him about how fresh the fish you bring in are."

"Well, to be completely honest, my son dies most of the work."

I smiled and began to unload the barrels. I saw the knight hand my father a bag of gold, "Three barrels of your freshest fish."

"Did you hear that son?" yelled my father.

I placed the barrels with the load we did today down.

"Here you are sir" I said. "Three barrels of..."

I stopped when I saw the edge of a sword at my face.

"Is there a problem sir?" I asked.

"Who are you?" he asked.

"This is Raikou" replied my father, "My son."

"This thing is your son?! Why does he look like this?!"

"I was born like this sir" I replied. "At first I thought I was weird, but now I don't know how I'd live without this."

The knight still looked confused, but he lowered his sword.

"Sorry" he said. "It was instinct."

"It's fine."

"Hey Raikou!" said a voice.

I turned and saw...
111311121.title: The Village

1113111211.content:
Behind me was the girl I wanted to meet. She was like something you would have read from a legend; her looks were a true sight to behold! She was more than a foot shorter than me, but it didn't matter. She had long blonde hair that nearly touched the ground she stepped on. Her eyes shined a brilliant blue that seemed to change as much as the water does. Her skin was tanned from the everglowing sun. She wore a long light-blue silk dress and no shoes. I simply stood there.

"Are you even awake?" she asked while giggling.

I mentally kicked myself awake and headed towards her. I could have sworn I saw a smile on my daf's face, but I didn't care.

"H-Hello" I stammered.

"Hello again Raikou" she said in a angelic voice. "You finally decided to come today?"

"Y-Yes, yes I did. You are usually here not that often."

"Well, my life gets complicated. I feel like I can't do anything for myself anymore!"

"At least you can go out in public and not get threatened."

She giggled and I nearly melted.

"By the way, I never really got your name."

"My name is Dafili."

"Such a beautiful name..."

She grabbed my hand and dragged me away. She was giggling a lot, and I couldn't have helped but to laugh. We went into an empty ally that connected two streets between two large buildings. As soon as I got near the middle however, a knight came and smacked me in the face with the hilt of his sword. I fell to the ground, and Dafili was surrounded by other knights. The one that knocked me down had his sword pointed at me.

"I should have you under arrest beast!" he said.

"What did I do!?" I exclaimed. "And what are you doing with Dafili?!"

"She's..."
1113111211.title: Dafili

11131112111.content:
"She's the princess of this region!" replied the knight.

I went blank. She's the princess?! Oh man, I have no chance with her now. She was so beautiful...

The knight pressed his sword into my throat, catching my attention.

"You were stealing the princess weren't you?" said the knight.

"No!" I replied. "I was following her!"

"Guards, he is telling the truth" said Dafili.

"Still, he is coming with us!"

The guards came off of Dafili and headed towards me.
11131112111.title: Princess Dafili

choices: The King was harsh to Raikou and threw him in prison
The King was nice and let Raikou out of the cage
111311121111.content:
I knocked the sword away and ran away. However, I was struck in the back with an object. The pain was too great and I fell over. It was an arrow that broke when I fell. I saw my dad walk over and he turned towards me.

"Da-!" I managed to say before they muffled me. They tied my hands and legs together and threw me into a cage. The cage was much smaller than me, and I was completely crammed in.

"What are you doing?" asked my dad.

"This thing was with the princess " replied the knight. "We assume that it was trying to harm her so were taking it to our prison."

Prison?!

"Prison? You can't be serious! That creature doesn't even look like it would harm a fly!"

My dad was trying not to say son because he didn't want arrested either. I felt a little bad, but understood. My dad wouldn't survive in prison. He's much too old to fight, while I had to survive just living here! Fighting my way through the streets.

"Sir, looks can be deceiving. We are taking this creature back with us for trial."

They all got on their horses and went off. I was placed in the carriage where they bought the fish I caught. I saw the looks on some of the faces of the townspeople. Some were shocked, others looked happy. I just sat there and cried, feeling like an animal.

---

I watched as Raikou sat and cried in the small cage the guards put him in. I turned to the head guard, who was smiling.

"No need to thank me princess" he said. "Although a pay raise wouldn't hurt either."

"A pay raise?!" I exclaimed. "You capture an innocent boy, cage him up like an animal, and drag him off to a prison, and you want a pay raise!?"

"The creature was..."

"His name is Raikou, and I was pulling him with me. I haven't seen him in years and I can't even say hello without you idiot guards "protecting" me!"

"Err...Uh..."

"I'm talking to my father about this manner. I suggest you keep quiet or I'll hold you personally responsible for it!"

The guard kept quiet and I looked out again. I sadly saw thunderclouds. I commanded them to stop the carriage and I climbed out.

---

The carriage jerked to a stop and the door opened. Dafili walked out holding something. I turned my head, since I could not turn my body. I heard her approach me and was about to speak. I cut her off, "What do you want?"

"It's about to storm" Dafili replied. "I thought you might want to have a blanket or something to cover you."

"I can deal with some water. After all, I am an animal to you."

"Raikou..."

"Dafili, just please leave me alone."

I heard her wimped, but she ran back. I saw the she placed the blanket beside me where I could reach. I felt the first few drops of rain, and then I saw lightning. I grabbed the blanket and wrapped myself. The blanket was soft and warm, but the rain changed that almost instantly. At least I had some resistance. The water soothed me and I fell asleep.

---

After a few hours of driving through stormy weather, we finally arrived at the castle. The rain stopped, but it looked like it would continue. I ran out of the carriage before anyone to see Raikou. He was asleep with the blanket I gave him around hid body. I smiled, but I lost that smile when the guards intentionally dropped his cage.

---

I felt a large hit all over my body. I woke up and saw that I was dropped. Dafili had an angry look, while the guards were laughing. A man dressed in a robe came walking down the flight of stairs, possibly the king.
111311121111.title: Caged like an Animal

1113111211112.content:
"Well I'm glad you made it home safely my dear" he said.

Dafili ran up and hugged the man. The one guard who captured me approached the king next.

"My lord, we have captured this beast" he said. "He was with the princess and trying to cause her harm."

The king walked over, opened my cage, and helped me out. I bowed in respect of the king, and his act of kindness.

"This surely does not act like a beast" he replied. "Looks can be deceiving. All guards are dismissed!"

The guards saluted and marched off. Dafili ran up and hugged me. My face felt warm and I could have sworn I was blushing. The king gave a chuckle and patted my shoulder. Dafili turned to her father, "Daddy, this is Raikou. He has been the one that catches all of your fresh fish."

"So your the legendary Raikou" he replied. "I must say, finest fish I have ever eaten. I always wondered how some pheasants do it, but now I see clearly."

"The fish that swim at the bottom of the sea are too far down for any ordinary dishing net" I explained. "I swim down with the bet and my dad pull the boat."

"I must apologize for my guards behavior. I just want my little girl to be safe."

"I understand. Do you have any way of returning me home?"

"You can't leave yet!" exclaimed Dafili. "I want to show you the castle!"

"Yes my boy, please stay."

What should I do? The guards treat me like a beast, but the king is kind and understanding. Plus Dafili wants me to stay as well. What should I do...
1113111211112.title: The Kind King

choices: Spend more time with the King (Research)
Spend more personal time with the Princess
11131112111121.content:
I decided to stay at this castle. The king told me if any guards or servents would mistreat me, they will be punished. He was thinking of making some rules to accept my kind and any other anthro kind out there, he wished he thought of that earlier. Also he made a message to be send to my father to apologize on what happend and that I'm spending the night hear.

"I'm glad you wanted to stay, even with how you were treated" said the princess, "Me and my father would love to know more about you"

So I was invited to a really nice dinner, better then any I had before. I explained to them that I was not adopted and was born from a human mother. This striked odd to the King and said that maybe he should some research done to see how this could of happened. Also I told the King that I met this daughter when I was a young child.

The king seemed to notice something possible between me and the princess. I guess I am a open book that I have fallen in love with the princess and she seems to have as well. The ruler said if the time comes that I can have the hand of his daughter. This of course shocked me, the thing is, I'm don't have royal blood. The king did not mind I am not of royal blood and maybe he should make changes to fit that.

After the great meal, I decided to...
11131112111121.title: Stay

111311121111212.content:
I walked with Dafili around the huge castle. And I mean huge! This place looked like it could fit my village in it and still have plenty of room. Dafili took me to the gardens. The garden was filled with a wide variety of flowers and plants. There was also a large pond with many water plants and fish. Dafili dipped her feet in, and I joined her. I splashed her slightly and she splashed me back. I pulled her in and she couldn't stop laughing.

"Having fun are we?" asked the king.

I stopped instantly and bowed my head, "Please forgive me for my..."

"Raikou, there is no need for that. Although, I would wish for you two to find an activity that wouldn't involve water."

Dafili and I walked out of the pond. There was no damage, so the gardener looked okay. A servant came out holding a blanket and wrapped it around Dafili. The water slipped off of me so I didn't have to worry. Dafili gave me a tour of the rest of the castle. We went to the guard training grounds, where they were sparring. I recognized one of them as the knight who caged me. He walked over and stuck out his hand, "No hard feelings?"

"Yes, hard feelings..." I replied. "Very hard feelings."

"Look, it's my job to protect the princess. And you look....like...."

"I LOOK like. I am not a monster. And even if I was, I would never attack a beautiful girl like Dafili."

"Beautiful? Sounds like you have feelings for her."

Although the king knew, and Dafili probably already knew, I think, but I was still slightly embarrassed. Dafili must have seen this reaction so she pushed me away. She led me to...
111311121111212.title: Dafili's Life

choices: Learn more about what the princess is like
1113111211112122.content:
The princess led me to a room, my guess it is her room. There is a guard next to the entry to the room to protect the princess. The guard stared at me, but thankfully did nothing to me. I guess the king made sure to spread a message to not bring harm to me and I'm a guest here.

Her room looked really lovely with all the royal treatment. She seemed to have everything she could ever want.

Dafili is sitting on her bed and seemed a little embaress. I checked to see what is going on with her. She seemed she wanted to speak, but before she could she kissed me on the my lips.

I am pretty shocked of this, but it is a nice sweet kiss. This confirmed that indeed the princess does love me. I kissed her back and we did it for a while.
1113111211112122.title: Her room

11131112111121221.content:
After we kissed for a little but, it was night time. The King had a room set up, but I didn't want to go just yet. I walked out of the room so Dafili could change clothes, from her dress into a nightgown. I sat on her bed with her, and we simply talked.

"So, what is your life like?" I asked.

"My life is pretty hectic" she replied. "My mother died when I was little, so my father is the only family I know. And ever since, my father wanted me to stay safe. But as you know, the guards get a little rough. Sorry about that..."

"It's fine..."

"Anyway, I lived my entire life in the castle. When I was around ten, I went with the guards to your town. That's where I saw you..." She blushed a little and so did I. "I saw you working with your father and I wanted to meet you. However, you kept going away everytime I approached you."

"I'm sorry" I said, "I just didn't want to scare you..."

"But that didn't stop us from meeting. Remember our "meeting"?"

I blushed again. The time we met was when I fell backwards and landed on her. That's when I fell in love with her.

"That's when I saw you and instantly fell in love" she continued. "At first I was kinda scared, because I never been up close to anything like you before. But, I saw past your appearance when you kindly helped me up. And you didn't even knew I was the princess."

"I treat everyone with kindness unless they show me a reason not to. Maybe your knights maybe..."

She giggled and we talked for a little while longer, but then I headed to my room. The room was a classic style room with a large bed. I just laid on top of the covers, since I never really get cold and to not make the servents do more work. I didn't want my stay to be a problem.

---

I woke up in the middle of he night. This happened a lot, my skin sometimes got dry and I had to get wet. I peered out of my room to see if any guards were out there. There was none, so I walked out. The hallways were dark and kinda spooky at night. I was about to turn down a corridor, but I saw a figure. It was heading towards the princesses room. I slowly krept behind it and followed. There were no guards by the doors.

Odd...why aren't they there?

I looked in the room, and saw a large knife. I slammed the doors open and the figure turned around.

"You will not hurt the princess!" I shouted. I charged at him, but forgot about the knife. He slashed it at me. Thankfully, he missed my heart but stabbed my chest. I fell to the ground but kneeled. The figure headed towards me again, but some guards ran in and restrained the man. Dafili was up, and she ran to my side.

"Raikou! Are you okay?!" she exclaimed.

The King barged in dressed in a robe as well. He saw the situation and understood everything.

"Guards! Throw this man into the dungeon to be questioned later!" he yelled. Dafili, take Raikou to the infirmary."

"Alright daddy"

I ran down with her as fast as I could. It was a long way, but I made it. The nurse was shocked but she helped me. They told me to stay in the infirmary for the night.

---

Option 1: Undercover
For the safety of the princess, the King sends Dafili with Raikou back to his hometown. At first, people became suspcious, but then they ignored her as well as him

Option 2: Chaperone
The person is a enemy of a rival kingdom. The King becomes worried, and sends the princess on a diplomatic plan. He sends her to a friendly kingdom hoping to gain some advantage against the enemy. However, the King must stay to uphold his duties. So, he asks Raikou to go with Dafili to protect her. However, he must train with the Knights before they leave in a few days
11131112111121221.title: Learn more about what the princess is like

111311121111212212.content:
I woke up in the infirmary. I turned my head and saw Dafili sleeping soundly. She must really care for me if she stayed down here. I smiled at tried to get up. Dafili stirred in her sleep so I laid back down. Her eyes opened and I closed mine to give the impression that I was sleeping. I heard her get up and sigh, "I hope your alright Raikou..." I heard her leave and I opened my eyes. I sat up and inspected my wounds. There were bandages covering my chest where I got stabbed. I tried to get off of the bed, but it hurt like crazy. My skin also felt very dry, I never got any water from last night. I managed to get up, but fell back down. Someone opened the door, and a servant walked in. The servant was female, she had dirty brown hair and red eyes. She ran in and helped me up.

"Are you alright sir?" she asked.

"I'm fine" I replied, "You don't have to call me sir. My name is Raikou."

"I'm sorry, but the Kong has given all of us orders to refer to his guests and knights as either sir or madame depending on their gender. Is there anything I can get you sir?"

I still hated being reffered to that, "Some water would be nice."

The servant made no haste as she left the room. She quickly came back with a large glass of water. She handed to me and bowed. I grabbed the glass and splashed the water on my face. The water felt nice running down my body, at least until it hit my bandaged area. I flinched in pain and the servant came over, "Are you okay sir?"

"I'm fine...thanks..." I replied. "What's your name?"

"Illiana sir..."

"That's a beautiful name."

I saw Illiana blush, "Oh sir..."

Illiana helped me up and I could walk on my own. I headed towards the main hall, where Dafili and the King were talking. Dafili saw me and ran towards me with open arms. We hugged tightly for a few minutes before the King came over.

"Raikou my dear boy, thank you for risking your life to save my beloved daughter" said the King.

Dafili kissed me on the cheek, "Your really sweet."

"T-Thanks..." I managed to say. "The wound actually doesn't hurt anymore. In fact..."

I started to remove the bandages until Dafili did the rest. Under the bandages, was nothing! We all gasped, there was no scar, no anything to tell if I was stabbed! The King spoke up, "Raikou, we found out the information on our intruder last night. He was a mercenary sent by one of our rival kingdom. Usually they don't do anything, but this is a surprise even to me that they would attack."

"What should we do?" I asked.

"Well, the Kingdom of Hzuio is one of their rivals too. We were planning a diplomatic journey for Dafili to unite our kingdoms. But, I'm afraid that they might attack again."

"...I'll go..." I said.

"Excuse me?"

"Dafili means as much to me as she does to you. I want to make sure that nothing will happen to her."

Both the King and Dafili smiled. Dafili gave me another kiss, and I felt my face turn red.

"Very well Raikou" said the King, "I will allow you to go on this journey. But, on one condition."

"Father..?" said Dafili.

"To properly defend Dafili and yourself, I need to pit you through the training program used for knights."

Great, just what I wanted to hear...

"I will only keep you in that program for three days, that's when Dafili will leave for her journey."

I sighed and followed a slave to the Knight's grounds.
111311121111212212.title: Chaperone

1113111211112122121.content:
I knew that I hated the guards, but I wanted to help Dafili. The slave even seemed nervous. Once I saw the grounds, the slave quickly retreated. I sighed and headed towards the Practice area. There, the Head Knight was waiting for me. "Glad to see you Raikou" he said. "I heard word from the King that you needed to go through our training course."

"Without the whole "monster" thing..." I added. "And it's only for three days..."

"Well, today we are doing one-on-one matches. Just grab a sword and..."

I ignored him and walked out into the sparring area. The guy I was facing had blonde hair and blue eyes. He laughed, "No sword? Are you asking to get killed?" I ignored him and prepared myself. Time to show these knights what I learned on the streets...

He swung his sword at me, but I sidestepped and dodged it. He tried again, but I did the same thing. The man never gave up, he swung like crazy. But, I was able to dodge all of them. It was getting old though. So I smacked the hand holding the sword, the reaction was him letting go. I swept his legs, quickly got up, and then caught the sword. I pointed it down to his neck, barely pressing against the surface. He glared at me full of anger, but I received applause from the others. The head knight congratulated me, and I performed the rest of the training for the day. It was simple exercise, something I could do forever. The others stopped after a while. I keep forgetting that I am not like most humans. Then again, I wasn't even sure if I was human..."
1113111211112122121.title: Knights are Not So Bad

11131112111121221212.content:
The three days of training passed very quickly. To be honest, the training wasn't as bad as I originally thought. I learned how to wield a sword, use the terrain around me to my advantage, proper shield use, and much more. Now today, was the day for us to leave. Me and Dafili would travel in a common carriage to not gain any suspicion. But I think the amount of knights in armor surrounding us would definitely cause attention. But I had no control over the matter. As for an even greater disguise, Dafili will be dressed in pheasant clothing. She seemed uncomfortable in them, but I told her she looked nice. This gained another kiss from her and my green scales flushed red. After about three hours, we were packed for the trip. It was going to be a week before we arrive at the kingdom and four days to the next village. The King was outside waiting for us, but to an even greater surprise, so were my patents! I knew my dad was able, but my mother has been sick for months! I instantly ran up to them and embraced them each in s hug.

"Mom! Dad! What are you doing here?!"

"We came to say goodbye..." said my father. "I knew you would find your love; but to think she was the princess!"

I turned to my mother, "Mom...how can you walk...?"

"The King received word of my illness and asked his healers to help. He's such a kind man." My mother approached Dafili, "So your the sweet girl that Raikou was talking about..."

Dafili nodded and this kept going. After our final farewells, I left my parents crying. I never knew if I was ever going to see them again. My mother was not bedridden anymore and I was leaving! But, I was going for the woman I loved, and that was all the better reason for me.
11131112111121221212.title: Sad Departure

112311.content:
It was the Fourteenth Century, an old wizard Magnus was waiting for his young peasant wife Morgana to deliver their first child.

In his castle high up in the mountains Magnus watched the peasant village through his magic telescope, he had been warned by the midwife, who also knew magic to stay away from the village during the childbirth, The Midwife and Magnus had been rivals for quite some time, and she probably demanded that Magnus stay away from the birth of his own child just to spite him.

Finally the hour had come! The child had been born! Magnus teleported to the village on a bolt of lighting, right to his wife's cottage.

It was a wild and stormy night, the rain was pouring heavily, Magnus simply summoned an umbrella out of thin air to shield himself from the rain.

He entered the cottage everyone was hovering around Morgana who was laying in bed

"Let me see her! Let me see her!" Magnus said in his big booming voice

Morgana was holding the child in her arms it was covered by a blanket

"Well Morgana," Magnus said "What be it? Is it a little man or a little maid?"

"Well..." Morgana said "It seems to be female, but it doesn't seem quite human."

"What do you mean?" Magnus said as he took the baby in his arms, he looked at the baby's face and gasped

"This is no child!" He exclaimed "It is a little calf!"

Indeed the baby seemed to be half human half highland cow, she had curly red fur all over her face and a little wet snub nose.

"Please don't be angry!" Morgana said "Even if the child is a calf we shall love her none the less!"

"I am not mad." Magnus said "But I wonder how this could have happened?"
112311.title: The Beginning of Something Special

1123112.content:
"I believe this may be may fault." Magnus said with a sigh "During the last few months I was practicing my spells and I used a cow as a target, the poor thing disintegrated on the spot, my Master Nikos said you should never use living creatures to practice your spells on, the spirits will be angry at you for that.

"What shall we name our daughter?" Morgana asked

"I suppose as a little cow we should think of something appropriate." Magnus said "Perhaps a flower name...Something like...Buttercup! Yes Buttercup should be a suitable name don't you agree?"

1212.content:
A man was sitting in a chair nervously outside the master bedroom, were his wife was giving to their first born child.

"You may want to do some pacing Will. It will do you some good." said an older man.

Will got up and started to move around. "It's helping Walt, thanks." he stated calmly.

"You would not believe how nervous I was when my wife was giving birth to Anna." Walt reminisced.

The doctor came out of the door to the master bedroom. "Is Anna OK? I the baby alright?" asked Will.

"Their both healthy, but the baby is.... Well, I show you." The Doctor rambled. They all entered the room and saw Anna holding the child which was covered in cloth. Will went over to them and saw something he thought he would never see. The baby had scales instead of skin. Horns on its head and wings on its back.

Before Will could say anything Anna spoke up. "This is our child."

"How?" He Question.

"I don't know." She said

"How are we going to rise this child? What will others do to it?"

Walt spoke up "It will need a name before anything else."

"Right, Do I have a son or a daughter?" asked Will.
1212.title: Dragon

12121.content:
"So what will we name him?" asked Will.

Anna stated "I think we should call him Aaron." Aaron chirped with glee when he heard his name.

"Then Aaron it will be." Will chuckled. "May hold him?" Anna handed over to Will, who got a better look at his son who was about twenty inches long without his tail that Aaron was chewing on. He had bright orange scales and his tiny claws were white as snow. His teeth had yet to develop. "Doc, do think will take milk?"

"My guess is that he will be able to. I must be going, if you have any more questions just call me." With that the doctor left the room.

Aaron let out a loud yawn and fell quickly a sleep. Will looked over and saw Anna sleeping peacefully.

Walt whispered to Will "I think we should let these two get some sleep it has been a long day for both of then." Will put Aaron in his crib and slowly leaves the room.
12121.title: Its a boy

121211.content:
"Mommy, may I go outside and play." Aaron asked.

"Finish cleaning your plate than you can." Aaron quickly stuffed the last of the broccoli in his mouth and headed for the door. "Aaron, swallow your food before take another step." Aaron did as he was told. "And remember to stay in our yard and not to talk anyone you don't know."

"Yes, mom." He replied. As often parents want children to be safe for strangers, this went double for Aaron. Oddly, Anna and Will were not the only couple to have an anthro child. At the start of the year Aaron was born, other woman gave birth to anthros. Doctors and scientist could not find out why. Many school systems had start to prepare for having students that would not be completely human. The press started to go to family's houses who had anthro children. After while things started to calm down.

Then strange people came up to the parents and offered them money for their children. Many called the police to get rid of them, but they got away before cops got there. Few who rejected the offer had their kids go missing. No trace was ever found. The description of the on who the parents saw was always different from couple to couple.

At one time a man came up to Will and asked him if he would sell his son. Will told the man to leave before he called the cops. Walt was right behind the man and for a seventy two year old retired boxer, he smacked him a good one. The man was arrested by the police shortly after the brawl. He didn't say anything during the interrogation, but authorities believe who ever he is working for is behind the kidnappings and possibly the anthros being born too.

As Aaron playing, he saw a white van pull up to the curb and two people came out of it. They quickly moved towards him.

Aaron

There is a reason that may remain unknown to both the mother and father of the baby anthro Skunk.

122111.content:
After the doctors took the boy into testing, the parents stayed in complete silence for about thirty minutes. Random thoughts passed through their heads, from whether or not he would ever be able to speak, to if there were any special types of schools for anthros.

Eventually a doctor walked in. Before saying anything, he stalled, took a mint out of his pocket, and sat down.

"Is-" the mother stuttered, "-is he okay?"

The doctor put the mint in his mouth. "Well," he said, "he appears to be healthy, from what we can tell, that is. However, we feel it's very important that we keep him here over the next few days, to-" The doctor stopped speaking, as the parents just nodded and seemed completely helpless and prepared to go with whatever he suggested.

"Have you ever seen anything like this before?" the husband asked.

"No," he replied, "not myself. I've read about Musteloidea-Humanoid births, but..." he paused, and started crunching his mint. "I've never seen anything close to this before."

"What should we-"

"I have someone you may want to meet with." the doctor cut off the woman, and handed the husband a card.

It was a card for...

You and your mate are seated on your sofa with the blanket-wrapped infant in your arms, fresh from the hospital. Your mate is leaning against you as they smile down at the beautiful baby boy. "He's wonderful.." your mate says, reaching out and unwrapping the blanket from the head of the small boy, to reveal your son's missing human ears, replaced with a pair of short, pointy, cat ears, with small black peach fuzz over them that will eventually grow into thicker, more hair-like "fur". He writhes to your mate's touch, making "Mmm"ing noises and softly opening his emerald-colored eyes, which gently rotate about, while exploring your features for a bit, before closing them again.

Your mate then leans down, kissing the tip of your son's pointy ear, smiling at you. "I just know we're going to be so happy, living together as a family.." The small boy squirms in your arms a bit, releasing small, high pitched "mews" into the air. Your mate raises an eyebrow. "Do you think he's hungry?"

How do you handle your first paternal dilemma?

1223321.content:
The happy couple are waiting in their hospital room. They had just given birth to their new child. Of course, they didn't expect the doctors to keep him or her away for so long. Monica sat on the bed, fearful of her child. She felt like weeping; maybe it was a miscarriage. The doctor and a nurse walked in holding a slightly large bundle of cloth. The bundle was at least larger then what most babies usually were. The doctor walked close to Monica's bed and the nurse followed close behind him. The doctor did not look happy for them. Instantly, the couple almost broke out into tears thinking their first child had died. David was trying to soothe his dear wife's sadness. The moment of sadness ended as the couple heard a slight cry coming from the bundle. The doctor sighed and then finally spoke, "Well, the child is semi-healthy but, well...just look."

The doctor lightly took the bundle from the nurse and gave it to Monica. David removed a bit of the cloth and looked at the child. Both Monica and David were shocked to see what it looked like. The child had two small antennas sticking out of its' head. It had yellow and black striped fur all over it's face. While finding out their child was a girl, they saw she had a small bump on her lower back. The couple saw it was a small, slightly preformed stinger. They were confused and wondered what had happened to their child. She resembled what looked like a giant bee. Monica held their baby girl in her arms, feeling small tears forming in her eyes. David just sat there with a stunned expression on his face. After a while he finally spoke, "Mom was right."

Monica looked at David both worried and confused, "She was right about what dear?!"

Tears streaked down David's face as he told her, "On our wedding night, my mother told me she'd curse us both. She did it just for me marrying you. But I didn't think this would happen."

The couple cried about that their daughter was now a Anthro creature. Monica and David knew that their child would have a hard time growing up in life. Their daughter opened her eyes and looked at her parents. Before they both realized that she was awake, a buzzing noise filled the room. Their child was flapping the small wings on her back. Taking this as a sign of fear from her child, Monica held her close in a loving embrace. They had to think about what to do. In the end, they decided to keep their unique child and name her Beatrice. The name seemed to fit very well. Concerned for her, they quickly take her home and...

As Monica and David walked inside holding their new baby girl trying to hide her from eyes for now atleast when they entered the two story house they knew many changes had to be done to the house first things first Monica sat on a kitchen chair looking at Beatrice who was fusing for a certain reason hunger (going to swap to David's POV) I looked about my house seeing all the new dangers that could happen to my little girl we had set up child safety locks on the lower cabinets so she would not open them but soon we learned that her wings worked even now I would have to set up more also all the ceiling fans would have to come down and probably have to put in normal lights the nursery had a large easy to open window if it opened she may fly away but what can I do my daughter is part bee and my mother is in her grave the old hag beleived magic would make her immortal I went up stairs to the nursery and moved the crib to our bed room Monica had finished feeding after it was moved she handed me my daughter Beatrice was sound asleep sucking on her thumb I smiled she may look different but all in all she was a normal baby though I wondered about the stinger Monica sat next to me. "your thinking about it to huh." she said looking at Beatrice I noded yes. "ya do you think it has the same effect as normal bees?" "probably not she's more human then bee." Beatrice sleeped for the whole night me Monica wondered how our live would be like from now on.

12233211.title: A small package with big changes.

choices: Skip to first day of school(start from home)
122332112.content: 16 years has past since my birth. I am what people call...unique. I'm an anthro bee, which means I'm half human and half bee. Yeah, that's how I'm unique. I take the basic structure of a human though. My body is covered in short hairs that varies between the colors black and yellow. My hair is black since most of the fuzz on my head it yellow. Two black antennas poke out of my hair and stick out greatly. My eyes are large and all one color like most insects. They are red, but if you look closely I have something like a pupil. Now to get to my body. In human terms, I have a body most girls my age want and what most guys drool over. Yeah, I have an hourglass figure. Even if I'm part bee I still get those looks from other guys. Besides the fact that my body is covered with fuzz, there are some other things to notice. Some bee things. My back has two large clear wings. I can fly, very well actually. On where my butt should be is where I have a stinger. It's pretty long too. It's about a foot long and about four inches thick. My arms and legs are mostly black and my fingers resemble claws. They look like them, but they aren't. There's one last thing about me that definitely makes me look like a bee. You know how most insects have six limbs and humans have four? Well, I have six. I have four arms. But I don't care, they are at most very helpful. Heck, I'm different and I'm proud of it! Another thing to note, I've been homeschooled for the last sixteen years. Yeah, my parents don't want me to catch too much attention. But they're finally allowing me to go to high school! After sixteen long years, I can be with other humans!
122332112.title: I'm Different and I'm Proud!(Beatrice POV)

1223321121.content:
As Beatrice got up she was more excited then ever. It was her first day at a real school. She jumped out of bed and picked up the outfit she chose yesterday. She ran into the bathroom to take a shower and brush her teeth afterwards. She started to put the outfit on. It was a black long sleeved sweater altered to allow her wings and extra arms through. She had a skirt that reached her knees and had a hole for her stinger. She began to put it on but it was a tight squeeze.

"Don't tell me this thing is growing bigger" she sighed. As she finally got it through, she then placed on white socks and ran out of the bathroom to get going. She grabbed her shoes but her mother stoped her, "Hold it young lady, sit down and eat. You have time." Beatrice sat down on her chair causing her stinger to move up. Her father sitting next to her, "Hello honey, ready for school?" He gave his daughter a warming smile and Beatrice smiled back. Her father always seemed to understand her desire to be with others but her mother would probably lock the front door and never let her leave. But she had to let this happen or else her daughter may never grow up properly.

"Okay dear here just eat some pancakes and you can go" Monica said as she came back with a small plate of pancakes. Beatrice got up and walked to the fridge. She pulled out a jar of homemade honey; one of her many talents. She learned the bees way to make honey and used the old tool shed as comb storage. Beatrice opened the jar and poured a little on her pancakes. As she started eating, David got up and grabbed a piece of paper. Beatrice had just finished the last pancake when he handed her the note. It said:"If you need to leave the school, call me or your mom okay. Also remember, don't let the other kids get to you okay."

Beatrice put the note in her pocket, hugged her father and mother and left. She opened her wings and flew off. The air was rushing around her as she flew. Beatrice decided to fly a few feet into the air to be high enough to avoid cars. She flew to the large building and was very excited. However, she found out that she left her backpack back home. Beatrice checked the clock and laughed; it was 4:30. She needed to be there at 6:00. Beatrice flew a quick dash back home. She found her father outside holding the black and yellow bag in his hands. He gave it to Beatrice and told her to hurry up before mom dragged her back inside. After returning to the school, she saw she was now only a minute early. 5:59 showed on her watch. The doors made a slight click sound as they unlocked. Beatrice's wings fluttered wildly with excitement. After sixteen years, she could become a normal teenager. Well, one with four arms, a stinger, wings and everything else but you get the picture. The first person that walked out was
1223321121.title: The start of so much trouble. (third person view)

12233211212.content:
A teenager walked out of the school just as it turned 6:00 a.m. It was a girl, like me. But she wasn't an anthro like me, she was human. Her hair was blonde and her eyes were blue. She was dressed as if she was going to a business meeting. I approached her calmly by slightly flying off the ground. Once she saw me, she freaked out. I had no idea what she was scared about but I continued to advance. She stepped back against the clear glass doors and curled up in a defensive position. She was saying something, but her voice was muffled. I backed up slowly, confused for what I did. Once I was far back enough, the girl finally looked up. Her eyes were filled with complete recognizable fear. I took a step, just trying to be friendly. She crouched again but looked towards the door. A woman was walking out of the front. Without a second to spare, the girl sprinted through the door and flew past the woman. The woman fell as a result. I flew over and stretched my arm out. The woman looked identical to the girl. But unlike the girl, the woman grabbed my hand as I helped her up.

"You must be that new student, Beatrice correct?" she said. I nodded and shook her hand. She continued, "I am Mrs. Brown, your principal. I see you already met my daughter Linda..."

I was shocked but it made sense. But, her fear wasnt cleared up. "Excuse me for asking Mrs. Brown, but why was she so scared of me?" I asked.

"I'm sorry dear, but Linda has a bad experience with bees. For one thing, she's allergic to bee stings. Two, her father was killed by a swarm of bees."

"I'm sorry..."

"It's not your fault Beatrice. But with her father's death she freaks out if she even sees a bee. I hope you don't take it personal."

"Nah, I'm just worried that the whole school won't accept me."

Mrs. Brown smiled as she lead me inside. She explained that I was a secret. Everyone heard something about me but only heard rumors. I was supposed to make a speech once every kid got here. I was to remain backstage until they all showed up. I didn't mind, I was going to school!

(Alright, how does the assembly go...?"

info.brief_description: Two humans decide to have a baby, but the baby is half human, half beast.
info.description:
This is my first story. I saw something like this on this website before, and it gave me inspiration to make one like it. For the dude or girl that wrote the story, I am not trying to copy it.

Setting: Medieval Times or Present Day
Location: Anywhere
Rules: 1) You can put it in any point of view, but 1st person would be nice
2) Please do not end the story, try to keep it as continuous as possible
3) The creatures can be regular animals or based from mythology:
Naga
Dragon
Pheonix
Sea Serphent
Harpy
4) Try to keep the sexual stuff low. Some is allowed if the characters are old enough. Kissing is allowed.
5) Try to keep your character as a anthro. The character is not allowed to transform into a complete human but I will allow for him/her to change into a complete beast.
6) Use your imagination! Try to make the story interesting
7) Additions must be at least two paragraphs long. No one-sentence scenes or short summaries.
